summary: UK YouTubers Announced for VidCon 2019 – TenEighty — YouTube News, Features, and Interviews
title: UK YouTubers Announced for VidCon 2019 – TenEighty — YouTube News, Features, and Interviews
description:
VidCon US will be holding its 10th annual event from 10-13 July in Anaheim, California, and will feature meet and greets, concerts, panels, an expo hall with booths and activities, and much more.

Numerous online creators have already been announced as attending the event, including many UK YouTubers. Those attending thus far include Charlie McDonnell, Sean McLoughlin, Phil Lester, Daniel Howell, LDShadowLady, Joel SmallishBeans and Saffron Barker.

This year’s VidCon will see the filming of the new original series, VidCon Now, with Dan and Phil being the first Featured Creators to take part. The series, which will be filmed throughout the duration of the event, will be uploaded across VidCon’s social channels, including Snapchat, Facebook and Instagram.

Organisers have also announced the extension of the 2019 Meet & Greet Lottery, meaning those wishing to enter for a chance to meet their favourite creators can send in their submissions until 9 June. Winners will receive their confirmations, as well as instructions, on 14 June.

Dan & Phil will be hosting a Meet & Greet at #VidConUS and the Meet & Greet Lottery has been extended until Sunday, 6/9!  If you already entered, you can modify your selections now to include them in your top 15. The lottery results will be made available on Friday, 6/14.

Those wishing to attend VidCon 2019 can choose from three different tracks: Community, Creator and Industry. Details regarding each track, as well as ticket information, can be found via the event’s official website.
